post.body: How's that Meraki you won at WDS08 working out for you? @FreeAusWireless

Odd. Meraki free wifi traffic only responsible for 880 MB so I've managed to download 4 GB myself. That's ... odd. I don't download stuff.
Bugger - thanks to the local free wifi leechers I've exceeded my peak cap and have now been throttled. I've tried to be nice ...
Having pasta sauce with hokkien noodles. Don't ask - I really didn't think it through.
The Australia Day TV ad is weird.
